title: Power Analysis: Derek Gee’s Monster Watts from the Stage that Split the Giro d’Italia Wide Open
content:
We dig into the incredible power file from Derek Gee in the Giro's queen stage: If it wasn’t for a disastrous start in Albania, the Canadian would be a half-minute to the 'maglia rosa.'

Read the full article at Power Analysis: Derek Gee’s Monster Watts from the Stage that Split the Giro d’Italia Wide Open on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
